short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks Distracting websites and makes you more Productive.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blocks Distracting websites and makes you more Productive. Automatically enables and disables for Tromodoro.com users.

Tromo Website Blocker blocks all the distracting websites and gives you encouraging quotes to help you get back on Track.

If you want to use the full functionality of the chrome extension, use it with the Tromodoro App (Tromodoro.com). Tromodoro is an advance version of Pomodoro timer that enables you to listen to your favorite songs and connects with Tromo Website blocker to block distracting websites while you are working.
